name: AddContactAddress
description:
Add an additional address to a contact in Zoho Books.

Use this tool to append a new address to an existing contact in Zoho Books. Suitable when updating contact details with more location information.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization for which the contact address will be added. This is required to specify the target organization in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the contact to which an address will be added.

parameters.name: contact_address_details
parameters.description: Provide address details as JSON, including fields like 'attention', 'address', 'street2', 'city', 'state', 'zip', 'country', 'fax', and 'phone'.

attention.description: Attention for proper delivery and routing of business correspondence. Max-length [100].

address.description: Street 1 address for the contact. Max-length [500].

street2.description: Street 2 address for the contact. Max-length [255].

city.description: City name for the address. Max-length [100].

zip.description: Postal or ZIP code for the address. Max-length [50].

country.description: Country name for the address. Max-length [100].

fax.description: Fax number for the address. Max-length [50].

phone.description: The contact phone number associated with the address. Max-length [50]
